Chunhui Zhang

Ph.D. student at Dartmouth College

15 Thayer Dr, Dartmouth College

Hanover, NH 03755

Greetings! I am Chunhui Zhang (pronounced as Ch'un-hui Chang/å¼ æ˜¥æ™–), a Ph.D. student in Computer Science at DartmouthðŸŒ², fortunately working with Professor Soroush Vosoughi.

I earned my MSCS degree and was honored with the GSAS Fellowship at Brandeis University. My research journey began at Northeastern University, where I obtained a Bachelor's degree in CS and received the Outstanding Honor Thesis Award.

My past research investigates intrinsic properties of deep learning across diverse modalities, then driving trustworthy real-world applications (i.e., robust property of Mixture-of-Experts [ICLR], meta learning on relational structures [TMLR], low-dimensionality in training data [ICML], and the emergence of language concepts in compact vision models [CIKM]).

news

August 31, 2023 Start my Ph.D. journey at Dartmouth College!

latest posts

November 1, 2023 I am looking for research internship. I appreciate a ping if you see a job I might fit! :-)
